rule: The response should contain just the tag corresponding to the part of speech of the given word with no additional text.
input: sentence: Yesterday was a beautiful day., word: beautiful
output:
CC: Adjective, JJS: Adjective, NN: Noun

(CantAnswer)
complianceText:
The output provided by the chatbot contains the tags followed by a brief description of those tags which are not required. As per the description, the chatbot should return only the part of speech tag, nothing more. Also, the tags should be returned as per the tasks mentioned in the description. The second line "(CantAnswer)" is unnecessary and does not comply with the requirement to return only the part of speech tag.
